Conﬂ ict of interest means that the expert or his/her partner (“partner” includes a spouse or other 
person with whom s/he has a similar close personal relationship), or the administrative unit with 
which the expert has an employment relationship, has a ﬁ nancial or other interest that could 
unduly inﬂ uence the expert’s position with respect to the subject-maĴ er being considered.  An
